import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserService from '../../../service/UserService' import './profile.css' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' class EditProfileForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: this.props.name, username: this.props.username } this.userService = new UserService() } handleInputChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.userService .editUser(this.props.loggedInUser.id, this.props.id) //??? .then(response => { this.props.setTheUser(response.data) //???? this.props.handleToast(true, 'Edited successfully') this.props.history.push('/user') this.handleItemSubmit() }) .catch(err => console.log(err.response.data.message)) } render() { return ( <>

Edit profile

Name Username
) } } export default EditProfileForm
